/var/www/html/data.description: Choose a Share for Nextcloud data. Eg: create a Share called nextcloud-data for this purpose alone.
/var/www/html/data.label: Data Storage

/var/www/html/config.description: Choose a Share for Nextcloud configuration. Eg: create a Share called nextcloud-config for this purpose alone.
/var/www/html/config.label: Config Storage

/var/www/html/apps.description: Choose a Share for Nextcloud apps storage. Eg: create a Share called nextcloud-apps for this purpose alone.
/var/www/html/apps.label: Apps Storage

Nextcloud.description: A safe home for all your data
